thread.title: Uber CEO Steps Down from Trump Council, Celebs React
thread.title_full: Uber CEO Steps Down from Trump Council, Celebs React

author: Just Jared
title: Uber CEO Steps Down from Trump Council, Celebs React
text:
Travis Kalanick has decided that he will step down from President Trump ‚Äòs economic advisory council following lots of backlash that included a #DeleteUber campaign .
The Uber CEO faced criticism after the president signed an executive order banning refugees and other immigrants from seven Muslim countries.
‚ÄúEarlier today I spoke briefly with the president about the immigration executive order and its issues for our community,‚Äù Kalanick said in a statement. ‚ÄúI also let him know that I would not be able to participate on his economic council. Joining the group was not meant to be an endorsement of the president or his agenda but unfortunately it has been misinterpreted to be exactly that.‚Äù
Celebs like Jaime King and Billy Eichner are speaking out with their thoughts on Kalanick ‚Äòs decision. Read below!
Well, he has to keep the money coming in. I'm unconvinced of any in the pure intentions but glad he made this decision. Still using @lyft https://t.co/wxzJNAUHbB 
‚Äî Jaime King (@Jaime_King) February 2, 2017 

POWER TO THE PEOPLE!!! üá∫üá∏üè≥Ô∏èüåà https://t.co/JIZyDsr44m

Uber CEO gone as Trump advisor while Vanity Fair, NY Times & SNL enjoy record increases #TrumpEffect in its full glory #CultOfTrump #Resist pic.twitter.com/sLYqz3nrT4
